section.name: Maven :: Indexer Core
section.p: Indexer Core contains the core support for indexing Maven repositories, searching them, publishing and consuming remotely published indexes.

ul.li: u: Artifact unique groupId|artifactId|version|classifier|extension (or packaging) (as keyword, stored)

v: Artifact Version (as keyword)
